resources.string:
Thank you for choosing The Shoe Store. 

This app allows you to view and update your shoe inventory. 

Please proceed to the next screen to view instructions.

1. Click 'Proceed' to go to the Shoe List 

2. Click the '+' button to add a new shoe 

3. Enter the details for the shoe you wish to add 

4. Click 'Cancel' if you want to return to the Shoe List without adding the shoe 

5. Click 'Save' to save the shoe and return to the Shoe List 

6. You can return to the 'Login' Screen by clicking 'Logout' from the menu
